name: Numpy
title: [NumPy](https://numpy.org/) is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python. This cheat sheet is a quick reference for NumPy beginners.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: [NumPy](https://numpy.org/) is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python. This cheat sheet is a quick reference for NumPy beginners.

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body: You’ll also need to import numpy to get started:

cards.back: Splits arr into 3 sub-arrays
